Levels.2221: Start oncoming traffic with up to 12 vehicles driving south.
Levels.2222: End oncoming traffic with up to 12 vehicles driving south.
Levels.2241: Start vehicle being overtaken from front with up to 3 vehicles that appear in front driving north in lefthand of northbound lanes.
Levels.2242: End vehicle being overtaken from front with up to 3 vehicles that appear in front driving north in lefthand of northbound lanes.
Levels.2251: Start vehicle being overtaken from behind with up to 2 vehicles that appear behind the subject and drive past.
Levels.2252: End vehicle being overtaken from behind with up to 2 vehicles that appear behind the subject and drive past.
Levels.2421: Start pedestrians oncoming on the opposite side of road. Up to 4 pedestrians walk north to south along the west side of the road.
Levels.2422: End  pedestrians oncoming on the opposite side of road. Up to 4 pedestrians walk north to south along the west side of the road.
Levels.2441: Start pedestrians passing on same side of road. Up to 4 pedestrians walk north to south along the east side of the road.
Levels.2442: Start pedestrians passing on same side of road. Up to 4 pedestrians walk north to south along the east side of the road.
Levels.2711: Start  construction zone. 24 barrels and cones blocking the lefthand of the northbound lanes. Always visible do not pop up.
Levels.2712: End  construction zone. 24 barrels and cones blocking the lefthand of the northbound lanes. Always visible do not pop up.
Levels.2811: Start police car in driver line of sight.
Levels.2812: End police car in driver line of sight.
Levels.3200: All at high-perturbation rate with low visual complexity.
Levels.3210: Tile complexity 1 high perturbation rate and high visual complexity.
Levels.3220: Tile complexity 2 high perturbation rate and low visual complexity.
Levels.3230: Tile complexity 3 low perturbation rate and high visual complexity.
Levels.3240: Tile complexity 4 low perturbation rate and high low complexity.
Levels.4210: Vehicle moves into the defined lane of travel from either the left or right side of the lane
Levels.4220: Vehicle moves right of the defined lane of travel
Levels.4230: Vehicle moves left of the defined lane of travel
Levels.4312: Driver has completed the lane position correction.
Levels.4411: Vehicle approached within 3 meters of obstacle resulting in near miss.
Levels.4421: Vehicle collided with an environmental entity.

Levels.course_correction: Course correction has been detected because the vehicle has a heading error of more than 5.1566 degrees from the forward direction or the driver is steering away from the perturbation with a steering angle of more than 4 degrees.
Levels.cue_sound: A sound which is meant to signal the start of a perturbation.
Levels.driving_scenario: A driving scenario with other cars or pedestrians in some configuration.
Levels.left_perturb: Perturbation that moves the vehicle to the left via perpendicular force.
Levels.non_cue_sound: A sound which is not meant to cue the start of a perturbation.
Levels.right_perturb: Perturbation that moves the vehicle to the right via perpendicular force.
Levels.show_speed_sign: A mph road sign of specified speed.
Levels.tile_change: A change of experimental condition with a 2 by 2 design varying visual complexity and perturbation rate.
Levels.system_failure: A system failure causes data to be invalid
